about_the_game:
Cleanse the Crypt’s Scourge

Wielding the holy light, you are tasked with purging the crypt of its dark inhabitants, from cunning grave robbers to nefarious necromancers. Prove your worth and conquer Blackfire Crypts.

Choose Your Class: Paladin or Invoker

Whether you embody the righteous Paladin, wielding might and steel to purge and punish, or the mystical Invoker, summoning holy energy to smite foes down, the choice is yours. 

Master Tab-Target Combat

Engage in classic MMORPG-like tab-target combat that demands strategy and timing your abilities to overcome relentless enemies. Cast judgment upon adversaries, shackle the undead in holy chains and bring forth your vengeful crusade.

One Life, One Chance

In this high-stakes, one-shot adventure, every decision counts. Prepare wisely and fight fiercely—there are no second chances. Do you have what it takes to survive the darkness and emerge victorious?

Are you the chosen aspirant?

short_description: Aspirant of Blackfire Crypts is a one-shot dungeon crawler experience featuring classic RPG tab-target combat. As an aspirant of the light, you are tasked with cleansing the crypt, where you will face cunning grave robbers and nefarious necromancers. Will you survive the darkness?
